Uses of Class
io.netty.handler.ssl.SslProvider

  • Packages that use SslProvider 
    Package Description
    io.netty.handler.ssl
    SSL · TLS implementation based on SSLEngine

    • Uses of SslProvider in io.netty.handler.ssl

      Methods in io.netty.handler.ssl that return SslProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SslProvider SslContext.defaultClientProvider()
      Returns the default client-side implementation provider currently in use.
      static SslProvider SslContext.defaultServerProvider()
      Returns the default server-side implementation provider currently in use.
      static SslProvider SslProvider.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static SslProvider[] SslProvider.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in io.netty.handler.ssl with parameters of type SslProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean SslProvider.isAlpnSupported(SslProvider provider)
      Returns true if the specified SslProvider supports TLS ALPN Extension, false otherwise.
      static boolean SslProvider.isOptionSupported(SslProvider sslProvider, SslContextOption<?> option)
      Returns true if the specified SslProvider supports the specified SslContextOption, false otherwise.
      static boolean SslProvider.isTlsv13Supported(SslProvider sslProvider)
      Returns true if the specified SslProvider supports TLS 1.3, false otherwise.
      static boolean SslProvider.isTlsv13Supported(SslProvider sslProvider, Provider provider)
      Returns true if the specified SslProvider supports TLS 1.3, false otherwise.
